name: Lunar_Lander
description:
Lunar lander is a video game where you must land a spaceship correctly in platforms.

When the player landing is to fast it crashes, starting in an initial platform, in the oder hand a correct landing grants points depending how far is the player from the initial platform. 

The player must be careful because the spaceship fuel is not infinite, and if it runs out, the game ends.

Game programer: Williams Facundo

Artists: Lucas Quiñones and Martin Hummel
